BiblioData.Title: WHITE LIGHT EMITTING DEVICES
BiblioData.Abstract: A white light emitting semiconductor nanocrystal includes a plurality of semiconductor nanocrystals.

Claims.P: 1. A light emitting device comprising an emissive layer including a plurality of semiconductor nanocrystals, the plurality of semiconductor nanocrystals generating white light upon excitation.

2. A light emitting device comprising: a first electrode; a hole injection layer in contact with the first electrode; a hole transporting layer in contact with the hole injection layer; a hole blocking layer in contact with the hole transporting layer; an electron transporting layer in contact with the hole blocking layer; a second electrode in contact with the electron transporting layer; and a plurality of semiconductor nanocrystals between the electron transporting layer and the hole blocking layer, the plurality of semiconductor nanocrystals including at least two distinct color emissions when excited.
3. The device of claim 2, wherein the first electrode is a transparent electrode.
4. The device of any one of claims 2 or 3, wherein hole injection layer includes a conducting polymer.
5. The device of any one of claims 2-4, wherein the hole transporting layer includes a benzidine.
6. The device of any one of claims 2-5, wherein the hole blocking layer includes a triazole.
7. The device of any one of claims 2-6, wherein the electron transporting layer includes a metal complex.
8. The device of any one of claims 2-7, wherein the second electrode includes a metal.
9. The device of any one of claims 2-8, wherein the plurality of semiconductor nanocrystals can include at least three distinct color emissions when excited.
10. The device of any one of claims 1-9, wherein the plurality of nanocrystals includes red, green and blue light emitting nanocrystals.
11. The device of any one of claims 1-10, wherein a nanocrystal includes a core.
12. The device of any one of claims 1 -9 , further comprising an overcoating on the core, the overcoating including a second semiconductor material.
13. The device of any one of claims 1-12, wherein the device has an external quantum efficiency of at least 0.20%.
14. The device of any one of claims 1-13, wherein the device has CIE coordinates of (0.35, 0.41).
15. The device of any one of claims 1-14, wherein the device has a color rendering index (CRI) of 86 as compared to a 5500K black body reference.
16. A method of forming a device of any one of claims 1-15, comprising: placing a plurality of semiconductor nanocrystals between a first electrode and a second electrode.
17. A method of generating light comprising: applying a light-generating potential to a device of any one of claims 1-16.
18. A display including a plurality of light emitting devices of any one of claims 1-17.
